main_definition: Officials are individuals who hold positions of authority or responsibility, typically in governmental, administrative, or organizational contexts.

meanings_and_examples.example: The city officials were responsible for implementing new policies to improve local infrastructure.
The police officers are in charge of maintaining law and order within the community.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Authorized representatives or agents of an organization
meanings_and_examples.example: His role as a representative official allowed him to negotiate contracts on behalf of his company.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Personnel in charge of specific tasks or functions within an institution
meanings_and_examples.example: The officials overseeing the construction project ensured that all safety regulations were followed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Administrative staff who assist with paperwork and bureaucratic processes
meanings_and_examples.example: The clerical officials at the courthouse handled numerous legal documents every day.
